mapper.select: SELECT c.*, i.id AS item_id, i.catalog_id AS item_catalog_id, i.sn As item_sn, i.title AS item_title, i.brief AS item_brief, i.description AS item_description, i.icon AS item_icon, i.created_at AS item_created_at, i.updated_at AS item_updated_at FROM itsnow_msc.public_service_catalogs c LEFT OUTER JOIN itsnow_msc.public_service_items i ON c.id = i.catalog_id ORDER BY c.level,c.parent_id

SELECT c.*, i.id AS item_id, i.catalog_id AS item_catalog_id, i.sn AS item_sn, i.title AS item_title, i.brief AS item_brief, i.description AS item_description, i.icon AS item_icon, i.created_at AS item_created_at, i.updated_at AS item_updated_at FROM itsnow_msc.public_service_catalogs c LEFT OUTER JOIN itsnow_msc.public_service_items i ON c.id = i.catalog_id WHERE c.sn = #{sn}

SELECT c.*, i.id AS item_id, i.catalog_id AS item_catalog_id, i.sn AS item_sn, i.title AS item_title, i.brief AS item_brief, i.description AS item_description, i.icon AS item_icon, i.created_at AS item_created_at, i.updated_at AS item_updated_at FROM itsnow_msc.public_service_catalogs c LEFT OUTER JOIN itsnow_msc.public_service_items i ON c.id = i.catalog_id WHERE c.parent_id = #{id}
